column1: The '''Ilkorindi''' (also '''Ilkorins''') was a name in the ''[[The Book of Lost Tales (disambiguation)|Book of Lost Tales]]'' for those [[Elves]] who were not of [[Kôr]] (cf. ''[[Úmanyar]]'' "not of [[Aman]]") and it referred to the [[Elves]] who stayed in the [[Middle-earth|Great Lands]]. Their language was [[Ilkorin]].<ref>{{HM|IX}}
